title:
Translating plugin.xml
i22n plugin.xml
Similar to the usage of keys in the application model, you can use the key prefixed with % in the plugin.xml file. The Eclipse tooling supports extracting existing String values from the plugin.xml file. Select your plugin.xml file, right-click on it and select menu: Plug-in Tools Externalize Strings
.
Eclipse PDE Wizard for externizing plugin.xml
Via menu: PDE Tools Internationalize
you can also directly create one or several fragments for the result of the internationalization.
